result.html: Gabhadh éHe was arrested.
result.ponchtml: Gaḃaḋ éHe was arrested.

result.html: Ghabh na póilíní méThe police arrested me.
result.ponchtml: Ġaḃ na póilíní méThe police arrested me.

result.eng: He was arrested with a gun in his possession.

result.ponchtml: Gaḃaḋ é agus gunna ina ẛeilḃ aigeHe was arrested with a gun in his possession.
